name: Fullmetal Repairman
description:
Description :

You're are inside a giant robot which is fighting a giant threat. You need to repair its problems which appear each time the robot gets hit !

Stay strong and try to survive for the good of mankind !

How to play ? :
  • Keyboard
    • zqsd to wasd to Move
    • Space to Jumb
    • Enter to Repair
    • Esc to Pause game
  • Controller
    • Right stick to Move
    • B to Jump
    • A to Repair
    • Start to Pause the game
